About Me

Get to know about me better

BIO

Pursuing Computer Science at University of Western Ontario in London, ON. Canada. Career interest? Software Developer. Personal interest? hm.. Food enthusiast, Taekwondo and intense workout! Life goal? Well I have so many goals in my mind, so reach me out and I will tell you more stories in person.

Communitech

Campus Ambassador

• Led a team of fellow campus ambassadors through the process of organizing and promoting Communitech events to Western.

• Promoted the student's event called Code and Design to Win, an UI design/programming competition.

• Actively interacted with students who were interested in the event by updating the event related information and answering questions through social media.

• By successful promotion and teamwork, the number of attendance was tripled compare to the previous year.

Campus Creative

Game Developer

• Worked as a game developer with using Unreal Engine at Campus Creative, the gaming company.

• Developed a mobile game called Endless Runner and learned the fundamentals of Virtual Reality game development with using the HTC Vive virtual reality system.

• Maintained fluid communication with my superiors to build trust, improve work quality, and ensure deadlines were being met.

Western Taekwondo Club

Vice President of Finance

• Act as the primary signing authority for financial account with Campus Recreation Advisor.

• Assist Campus Recreation Advisor with registration processes of members and maintain collection of fees of all club members.

• Keep track of every financial transaction from the organization with using Microsoft Excel.
